畫.definition: to draw; to paint; picture; painting (CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]); to draw (a line) (variant of 劃|划[hua4]); stroke of a Chinese character (variant of 劃|划[hua4]); (calligraphy) horizontal stroke (variant of 劃|划[hua4])

畫像.definition: portrait; to do a portrait of sb

畫十字.definition: to make the sign of the cross; to make a cross (on paper)

畫圖.definition: to draw designs, maps etc; picture (e.g. of life in the city)

畫地為牢.definition: lit. to be confined within a circle drawn on the ground (idiom); fig. to confine oneself to a restricted range of activities

畫地為獄.definition: see 畫地為牢|画地为牢[hua4 di4 wei2 lao2]

畫地自限.definition: lit. to draw a line on the ground to keep within (idiom); fig. to impose restrictions on oneself

畫幅.definition: painting; picture; dimension of a painting

畫押.definition: to sign; to make one's mark

畫法幾何.definition: descriptive geometry (three-dimensional geometry using projections and elevations)

畫皮.definition: painted skin (which transforms a monster into a beauty)

畫眉.definition: to apply makeup to the eyebrows; (bird species of China) Chinese hwamei (Garrulax canorus)

畫稿.definition: rough sketch (of a painting); (of an official) to approve a document by signing it

畫等號.definition: to equate; to consider (two things) to be equivalent

畫荻教子.definition: to write on the sand with reeds while teaching one's son (idiom); mother's admirable dedication to her children's education

畫虎不成反類犬.pinyin: hua4 hu3 bu4 cheng2 fan3 lei4 quan3
畫虎不成反類犬.definition: to try to draw a tiger but end up with a likeness of a dog (idiom); to try to do sth overambitious and end up botching it

畫虎類犬.definition: to try to draw a tiger but end up with a likeness of a dog (idiom); to try to do sth overambitious and end up botching it

畫蛇添足.definition: lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous; to overdo it

畫面.definition: scene; tableau; picture; image; screen (displayed by a computer); (motion picture) frame; field of view

畫餅充飢.definition: lit. to allay one's hunger using a picture of a cake; to feed on illusions (idiom)

畫龍點睛.definition: to paint a dragon and dot in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch; the crucial point that brings the subject to life; a few words to clinch the point
